Summary:
On the signup page, when we select the country 
code for the mobile number, the code is not visible
 only "..." is displayed.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select country code
Expected Result: The country code must be visible

Summary:
When we send an OTP to register a mobile number,
 the message says the OTP comes from MyTop10Store.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number
Expected Result: The otp should say it comes from vini app

Summary:
When we provide our mobile number to receive an OTP and 
click on "Send OTP," if we then remove the application from
 the recent apps list and reopen it, we are automatically 
logged in using the provided number, without needing to
 enter the OTP. Additionally, there is no option to log out of 
the application.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number > send otp >
remove app from recent >reopen it
Expected Result:
Application should not logged in without 
correct otp

Summary:
When a user is already registered and attempts to sign up with
 the same number, they are logged in using an OTP.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select registered mobile number
Expected Result:
A message should say that the user is
 already registered.

Summary:
When we provide a mobile number and click on "send OTP," if we 
click on "resend OTP," it shows a message stating to resend OTP 
after 60 seconds. However, every time we click on resend, it
 always displays the same 60-second message.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number > send otp > 
resend otp
Expected Result: Timer should always change with time

Summary:
When we enter a mobile number and click on "Send OTP," if we then 
click on "Resend OTP," a message appears stating that we can resend
 the OTP after 60 seconds. However, after 60 seconds, nothing 
happens, and it appears that the feature is not working.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number > send otp > 
resend otp

Summary: There is no length validation for usernames during the signup process.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number >enter valid otp > 
give username & email
Expected Result: There should be length validation for username

Summary: There is no length validation for email during the signup process.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > go to signup page >
select mobile number >enter valid otp > 
give username & email
Expected Result: There should be length validation for username
